name: Plug and Play Tech Center
tag_list: startups, incubator, accelerator, startup-community, advisors, mentorship
overview:
Located in the heart of Silicon Valley, PlugandPlayTechCenter.com is a community of over 280 technology startup companies in the areas of Web 2.0, software (SaaS), systems, semiconductor and telecomm verticals. Since its inception in January 2006, the center has helped the startups raise in excess of $750 million in venture funding.

Entrepreneur-centered with strong relationships with the most influential venture capital firms of Silicon Valley and Ivy League universities in the nation, Plug and Play has become a great place to launch and grow promising new technologies.

Plug and Play Tech Center provides the following services for high-tech startups:

  • Funding opportunities (i.e. Amidzad, Plug and Play Angels Group, VC partners)
  • IT/Data Center Services
  • Hosted Events/Events Space
  • Real Estate Services (Office Space)
  • Access to partners in Offshoring Development of Software (i.e. Isthmus, PlanV Software, V2 Solutions), Human Resources (i.e. Nationwide Resources), Financial Services (i.e. Corefino, Silicon Valley Bank), Legal Services (i.e. Greenberg Traurig, Orrick)
  • Executives In Residence
  • Talent Acquisition - recruiting services
